channel.title: Velvet on Ergohaven's journey

item.title: Velvet
item.description: Connection Before connecting the keyboard to the computer, make sure that the USB-C cable is firmly connected to the connectors on both halves When connecting the keyboard to the computer, make sure the USB-C cable is firmly inserted into the connector Customizing keyboard Please refer to the Vial guide Функция Caps Word Одновременное нажатие клавиш LShift и RShift активирует Caps Word. Эта функция позволяет набирать слова заглавными буквами, не используя клавишу Caps Lock.
